version_description:
1.The captured pictures during live view and playback can be exported to your photo album directly.
2.Provide multi-language GUI. Added languages include Estonian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Thai, Traditional Chinese and Turkish.

1.The captured pictures during live view and playback can be exported to your photo album directly.
2.Provide multi-language GUI. Added languages include Estonian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Thai, Traditional Chinese and Turkish.

1. Newly designed UI.
2. 1, 4, 9, 16-window division mode for live view.
3. 1, 4-window division mode for remote playback.
4. The speed of the remote playback can be set as 1/4X, 1/2X, 1X, 2X and 4X.
5. Quickly start live view of one camera.

1. Newly designed UI.
2. 1, 4, 9, 16-window division mode for live view.
3. 1, 4-window division mode for remote playback.
4. The speed of the remote playback can be set as 1/4X, 1/2X, 1X, 2X and 4X.
5. Quickly start live view of one camera.

1. Password security displays for warning when the newly added device is using weak or risky password.
2. Provide the device activation (creating the password) function when adding the device.

1. Password security displays for warning when the newly added device is using weak or risky password.
2. Provide the device activation (creating the password) function when adding the device.

Select the region that your device is located in to correspond to the globally distributed hik-online servers

Automatically set the Wi-Fi network for the device and add it

Select the region that your device is located in to correspond to the globally distributed hik-online servers

Automatically set the Wi-Fi network for the device and add it

1. Fixed the issue of displaying only in English in iOS9.
2. Fixed the issue of XCodeGhost in iOS V4.2.0. Please upgrade to the iVMS-4500 V4.2.1 ASAP.

1. Fixed the issue of displaying only in English in iOS9.
2. Fixed the issue of XCodeGhost in iOS V4.2.0. Please upgrade to the iVMS-4500 V4.2.1 ASAP.

1.Support transcoded stream from NVR in Remote Playback.(The transcoded playback has to be supported by the NVR)
2.Support software dewarping for fisheye cameras.
3.Support up to 32-ch live view.
4.Support two-way audio with IP channel of NVR.

1、Support device backup and restore in batch by QR code.
2、Support fire source detection, behavior analysis, ship detection, and temperature measurement for thermal camera.
3、Support remote controller to operate the device menu.
4、Support up to 1
